mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user ( USER_ID, USER_PASSWORD, USER_NM, PSITN_INSTT_AUTHOR_CODE, EMAIL_ADRES, USER_MBTLNUM, USER_GROUP_CODE, LOGIN_FAILR_CO, PASSWORD_CHANGE_DT, CREAT_DT, CRTR_ID ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userNm}, '6', #{emailAdres}, #{userMbtlnum}, #{userGroupCode}, 0, now(), now(), 'tb_user_group' )
